mapper.sql: rentNo, rentDate, headCount, startTime, endTime, spaceNo, id
mapper.select: select rentNo, rentDate,headCount,startTime, endTime , spaceName, s.spaceNo, id, h.hostNo from Rent r, Space s, Host h where r.spaceNo = s.spaceNo and s.hostNo = h.hostNo and id = #{ id } order by rentNo desc
